info.title: Othello
info.author: Martin Butler
info.details:
This is a Wii U Homebrew version of the Othello game.

The player plays against the computer, alternating who plays first. The aim is to surround and flip the opponents pieces to your colour; the one with the most at the end is the winner.

Th full Rules and Instructions for the game can be found here:
https://www.mastersofgames.com/rules/reversi-othello-rules.htm

Hope you like it.

changelog: Initial release after review and test.
